mapper.insert: insert into User (name,password, nickname, birth, email, phonenum,address,cash,totalcash,sex) values (#{name},#{password}, #{nickname}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{phonenum},#{address},#{cash},#{totalcash},#{sex})
mapper.select: SELECT userId, levelId, name, password, nickname, birth, email, phonenum, address, cash, sex FROM user WHERE userId in (SELECT following FROM follow WHERE follower = #{userId})
